snippet: A Phoenix mother who was charged with felony child abuse after leaving her children in a hot car while she went to a job interview, missed a deadline to establish trust funds for the children.
abstract: Shanesha Taylor, Phoenix mother who was charged with felony child abuse after leaving her children in a hot car while she went to a job interview, misses deadline to establish trust funds for the children; prosecutor had agreed to dismiss charges if Taylor set aside money she had received in private donations after her arrest.
lead_paragraph: A Phoenix mother who was charged with felony child abuse after leaving her children in a hot car while she went to a job interview, missed a deadline to establish trust funds for the children.

headline.main: Arizona: Woman Accused of Abuse Misses Deadline
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Woman Accused of Abuse Misses Deadline
